================

**Tender Title:** Septic Tank and Privy Pumping Services, Cape Breton Highlands National Park

**Reference Number:** CB-247-91243760

**Announcement Date:** 2023-12-21

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-17T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Project Overview:**

Parks Canada Agency (PC) seeks a contractor to perform septic tank and privy pumping services at Cape Breton Highlands National Park. The project involves the pumping and inspection of septic tanks and privies to ensure proper sanitation and waste management within the park. The work will be completed between May 1, 2024, and November 30, 2024.

**Additional Requirements:**

* The contractor must provide septic tank and privy pumping services in accordance with the National Parks Regulations.
* The contract period is from May 1, 2024, to November 30, 2024, inclusive.
* The contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to 3 additional 1-year periods under the same conditions.

**Bidding Information:**

* Bidders can submit their bids through email or fax.
* Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted.
* The email size limit for sent bids is 15 megabytes.
* Bidders must ensure their bid documents are attached to the email and not shared via links.

**Submission Procedure:**

* Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

For any technical or contract-related inquiries, please submit your questions to the Contracting Authority.

**Notice and Attachment:**

For a copy of the notice and attachment, please refer to the following links:

- English Notice: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28154/rfq---5p300-23-0035a_en.pdf>
- French Notice: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28154/ddp---5p300-23-0035a_fr.pdf>
